body: the people in this comment section made a valid point recent ntrs are boring but I got into ntr because it has the most of the good arts so I don't care much

The NTR is kinda weak. I don't understand Japanese, but I think the MC is just "I love her because she's nice to me".  The female is just the usual "girl's fallen to fuckboi" and I think she doesn't even have any feelings for the MC. The art is nice though. Seems like the MC is able to move on too. Too bad he didn't have any guts to confess because looking at the female, I think the MC can at least lose his virginity to her.
